sentences.en: A few militant members of the crowd attacked the vendor.
sentences.cn: 人群中几个好斗的人攻击了那个小贩.

sentences.en: After the assassination of Martin Luther King, black leaders became more militant.
sentences.cn: 马丁•路德•金遇刺后，黑人领袖变得更为激进了。

sentences.en: Even now we could not be sure that the militants would not find some new excuse to call a strike the following winter.
sentences.cn: 即使到现在，我们也不能确定这些激进分子不会找到某个新的借口在下一年冬天号召一场罢工。

sentences.en: He entered the room in a militant mood.
sentences.cn: 他走进屋里,显出好斗的神气.

sentences.en: He is a militant in the movement.
sentences.cn: 他在那次运动中是个激进人物.

sentences.en: He was a militant idealist who crusaded against racial bigotry by growing faint in its presence.
sentences.cn: 他还是个富有战斗精神的空想家,他看到种族偏见的现象就要晕倒,以此来表示他的反对.

sentences.en: I'm for a more militant religion!
sentences.cn: 我赞成更富有进取心的宗教.

sentences.en: In those days if you asked "why?" about anything you were marked down as a militant.
sentences.cn: 那个时候，不管你对什么事情问“为什么”，都会被人视作激进分子。

sentences.en: My brother is of the acquiescent rather than the militant type.
sentences.cn: 我弟弟是属于服从型的而不是好斗型的.

sentences.en: NAACP and other militant Negro groups counseled resistance.
sentences.cn: 全国有色人种协进会和其他富于战斗性的黑人团体商讨抵抗办法.

sentences.en: Nothing could foul up their militant spirit.
sentences.cn: 什么也不能挫伤他们的斗志.

sentences.en: She is always militant in struggle.
Some militant leaders want to merge with white radicals.
sentences.cn: 一些好斗的领导人要和白人中的激进派联合.

sentences.en: Still, there was danger of their becoming ugly and militant.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 他们还可能变得难以应付,变得好斗.

sentences.en: The fiery right-wing leader toned down his militant statements after the meeting.
sentences.cn: 言辞激烈的右翼领袖在会后收敛了他的好战言论。

sentences.en: The Hunanese peasantry became very militant.
sentences.cn: 湖南农民变得非常富有战斗性.

sentences.en: We were accused of being militant left-wingers.
sentences.cn: 我们被人指责是好战的左翼分子。

trans.tran_cn: 斗志昂扬的，富于战斗性的，激进的，好战的，战斗中的，交战中的，好斗者
trans.tran_en: a militant organization or person is willing to use strong or violent action in order to achieve political or social change
